name: Roast Duck
recipeIngredient: Sesame oil or vegetable oil for basting.
recipeInstructions: 1. Remove the giblets from the duck and rinse well.
2. Pour boiling water over the skin and set aside to dry for 2 hours.
3. Grate 1/2 the ginger and squeeze the liquid into a small mixing bowl.
4. Add the honey, soy sauce, five spice powder and pepper to the bowl and mix well.
5. Paint 3/4 of the mixture over the duck skin.
6. Place the spring onions and the remaining ginger into the cavity.
7. Brush a large piece of foil with oil and set the duck in the centre and wrap well.
8. Place the duck in an oven dish and bake for 2 hours at Gas Mark 3 (160C, 320F).
9. Remove the foil and prick the skin to release fat. Brush with the reserved marinade, then with oil.
10. Bake uncovered for 30 minutes, turning once.
